name: Horse Course
description:
Here is my submission for the WOWIE Game Jam 2022. It's a Metroidvania puzzle platformer about a horseman named Charles and his AI companion. I would write more about it, but I am very tired. It looks like the aspect ratio is off unless you play it in fullscreen mode.

Move - wasd / arrows
Activate AI - space
Jump - up / z
Dash - c / shift
Throw - v / ?

Everything in the game was made by myself except for
Font: Alagard € by Hewett Tsoi
Sounds: 512 Sound Effects (8-bit style) | OpenGameArt.org
